tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE regulation_compliance (
    regulation_id INT NOT NULL,
    requirement_id INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (regulation_id, requirement_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES investment_regulations(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (requirement_id) REFERENCES compliance_requirements(id)
);

CREATE TABLE Compliance_Logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_date DATE,
    entity_id INT,
    requirement_id INT,
    compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE investment_products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    risk_level VARCHAR(50),
    regulation_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (regulation_id) REFERENCES investment_regulations(regulation_id)
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_checks (
    check_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    check_description TEXT,
    check_date DATE,
    officer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (officer_id) REFERENCES compliance_officers(officer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES investment_products(product_id)
);
